mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO PRODUCT(PNO,CATEGORY1,CATEGORY2,PNAME,BRAND,PRICE,PRODUCT_URL,PRODUCT_THUMURL) VALUES(pno_seq.nextval,#{category1},#{category2},#{pname},#{brand},#{price},#{product_url},#{product_thumurl}) INTO PRODUCT_OPTION(PNO,S,M,L,FREE,shipping,shippingday) VALUES(pno_seq.currval,#{s},#{m},#{l},#{free},#{shipping},#{shippingday}) SELECT * FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE CATEGORY1=#{category} ORDER BY PNO DESC

SELECT A.PNO, CATEGORY1, CATEGORY2, PNAME, BRAND, PRICE,PRODUCT_THUMURL,PRODUCT_URL,S,M,L,FREE,SHIPPING,SHIPPINGDAY FROM PRODUCT A,PRODUCT_OPTION B WHERE A.PNO = B.PNO AND A.PNO=#{pno} ORDER BY A.PNO DESC
